desc: We are looking for someone who can create an informative, useful and visually exciting promotion video for our newly developed app.The logo and screen shots of the app will be provided.In a creative and unique manner, the video must include an overview of the six main features of the app. We can provide text-based content: six headlines with two to three bullet points per feature.The whiteboard video may also comprise an overview of free/paid functions and voice overs may be included.The duration of the video should be approximately 1 min. (i.e. 10 seconds per feature), and have intriguing visual content.Rebound is an innovative app designed to help users regulate their medicine intake. Through personalized step-down programs, the overall goal is to reduce users’ medicine dosages whilst increasing their well-being.As we are targeting individuals who are withdrawing from prescription medicines, it is crucial that the video is comes across as respectful, and is created in an ethically correct manner.Please write “Seen” in the subject field, and include relevant videos from your portfolio, when applying.

desc: We are a small indie game development company called Ascension Entertainment LLC. We are taking our popular HL2 mod retail and we need another character/weapon animator and rigger. In particular someone who knows how to import animations to the Unreal editor.We already have a small team together to make a playable feature limited demo (2 programmers, 2 modelers, 1 texture artist/modeler, 1 animator, 2 concept artists, 1 sound effect engineer and 1 music composer)We've made progress in that we have the storyline and the features fully written out, 2 character models (2 fully textured and optimized), 3 weapon models, part of skybox model and 6 original songs.  You would be rigging and animating 2 character models which each require approximately 85 animations.We're in the pre-funding stage so you cannot be paid, but pending successful Kickstarter funding we would hire you for full time work.Familiarizing yourself with our mod "Modular Combat" would help you understand the sequel. The gameplay will remain the same, but the story and setting have changed. See [url removed, login to view] for information about Modular Combat and [url removed, login to view] for information about Modular Combat 2.The engine for Modular Combat 2 will be Unreal. Animations can be done in any program, but if you're familiar with importing animations into Unreal; that would be a great asset.Requirements:- English as first/primary language- 18 years and older- Experience with animating and rigging- Although not required, experience with Unreal editor would be an assetNote: Successfully chosen candidate will also be required to sign an NDA before any further information is made available.[The Administrator removed this message for containing contacts details which breaches our Terms of Service]and include links to past works and your Resume/CV.
title: 3D Animator/Rigger Needed For Eventual Paid Position
